Course Link.description: The direct URL to the course page. Do not include any additional information or text.

Course Title.description: The complete title of the course along with its level, if available (e.g., 'MSc in Computer Science'). Write degree level in the name first and then add degree name like BS Accounting not Accounting BS. If the title is not explicitly stated, summarize it. If no title can be derived, use 'NA'.

Required IELTS Score.description: The minimum IELTS score required for the course, specifying the overall score and, if applicable, the minimum scores for each section (e.g., 'Overall: 6.5, Reading: 6.0'). If only overall is provided, include that. If no score is mentioned, use 'NA'.

Required PTE Score.description: The minimum PTE score required for the course, including overall and any section scores (e.g., 'Overall: 58, Writing: 54'). If only overall is given, include that. If missing, use 'NA'.

Required TOEFL Score.description: The required TOEFL score, including overall and section scores if available (e.g., 'Overall: 80, Speaking: 20'). If only overall is provided, include that. If not available, use 'NA'.

Entry Requirement.description: A detailed summary (minimum 100 words) of qualifications needed for admission, including tests like A Levels, IB, GRE, GMAT, or others. Mention any Pakistan-specific info if present. If nothing is mentioned, write 'NA'.

Education Level.description: Level of education: 'Undergraduate', 'Master', or 'PhD'. If not explicit, deduce. If unclear, 'NA'.

Course Level.description: Academic level: 'Bachelor', 'Master', 'PhD', 'Diploma', 'Major', 'Certificate', 'Pathway', or 'Specialisation'. If not explicit, deduce. If unclear, 'NA'.

Intake.description: The next enrollment period (month/year). If not mentioned, infer or 'NA'.

Duration.description: Total duration in years (e.g., '1 Year', '2 Years'). If not direct, deduce. Else 'NA'.

Start Date.description: Exact course start date. If not given, summarize or 'NA'.

Degree Format.description: Delivery: 'On Campus', 'Online', or 'Blended'. If not explicit, infer or 'NA'.

Location/Campus.description: Campus or city where offered (e.g., 'Main Campus', 'New York'). If unclear, deduce or 'NA'.

Annual Tuition Fee.description: Yearly tuition fee (2025/26) for international students. Include both Full-time & Part-time if available. Show in currency. If missing, 'NA'.

Initial Deposit.description: Initial admission deposit. If not applicable, 'NA'.

Application Fee.description: Application fee in currency. If none, 'NA'.

Overview.description: A 300–400 word overview of the course, covering topics, objectives, and outcomes. Summarize without direct copy.

Course Structure.description: A 300–400 word description of the curriculum structure. Mention specific subjects if available.

Year 1.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 1 content. If degree shorter than 1 year, 'NA'.

Year 2.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 2. If degree shorter than 2 years, 'NA'.

Year 3.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 3. If degree shorter than 3 years, 'NA'.

Year 4.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 4. If degree shorter than 4 years, 'NA'.

Year 5.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 5. If degree shorter than 5 years, 'NA'.

Year 6.description: 200–250 word summary of Year 6. If degree shorter than 6 years, 'NA'.

Career Opportunity 1.description: First career/job title linked to program. If missing, deduce.

Career Opportunity 2.description: Second career/job title linked to program. If missing, deduce.

Career Opportunity 3.description: Third career/job title linked to program. If missing, deduce.

Career Opportunity 4.description: Fourth career/job title linked to program. If missing, deduce.

Career Opportunity 5.description: Fifth career/job title linked to program. If missing, deduce.
